arts.ttl: Daniel Farke compliments a key Brighton attacker who has ‘progressed really well’
arts.sum: He spent some time talking about the qualities of two of their key figures he has encountered in the past: Fabian Hurzeler, the youngest Premier League manager, is a man he knows from Germany, and Georginio Rutter, a technically gifted French forward, was formerly on the books at Leeds. Their match management is not the strongest, but the talent in the group is visible to the Leeds head coach, who goes into their duel with respect.

arts.ttl: Georginio Rutter makes his feelings clear about Leeds United fans ahead of Saturday
arts.sum: Georginio Rutter was a fan favourite during his time at Leeds United. Spending close one-and-a-half years at the club he knows a thing or two about playing at Elland Road. Joining on a club record fee in January 2023, he left after failing to securing a promotion to the Premier League in 2024. arts.ttl: Brighton & Hove Albion vs Leeds United Preview: Premier League, Gameweek 10, 2025
arts.sum: Leeds United head to the Amex to take on Brighton & Hove Albion in the tenth game of the Premier League season, with both sides hoping to secure a valuable 3 points. In the Premier League this season, Leeds United have only managed to win 1 away game which came against 20th placed Wolves.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke to spark major Leeds United controversy with team selection vs Brighton
arts.sum: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke has a few selection headaches ahead of Saturday’s trip to Brighton. However, the German head coach will create a major controversy if he decides to change his backline from the win against West Ham last weekend. arts.ttl: 7 players ruled out for Brighton vs Leeds United including Elland Road favourite
arts.sum: Leeds United fans can rejoice as Brighton will be short on options with as many as seven player ruled out of Saturday’s clash. Meanwhile Daniel Farke reported he has a full squad at his disposal. Farke is not expected to make wholesale changes to the side that played against West Ham. arts.ttl: Brighton vs Leeds predictions: Seagulls to make home advantage count
arts.sum: Elliott Bretland says Leeds can finally end their long scoreless streak at Brighton but still expects the hosts to come out on top.
